2026-01-14.content:
Effective immediately, Cloud Tools for PowerShell is deprecated and can no
longer be installed using the Google Cloud CLI. For more information, see
[Cloud Tools for PowerShell deprecation](https://docs.cloud.google.com/powershell/docs/deprecations).

summary.title: Cloud Tools for PowerShell Deprecated
summary.summary: Cloud Tools for PowerShell has been deprecated and is no longer available for installation via the Google Cloud CLI. For further details, please refer to the deprecation notice.
